title: Automatic process control
brief_description: Illustrates the advantages to be derived from applying automatic control to a process in a small chemical plant. The four modes of control are discussed: on/off; proportional; proportional with reset; proportional with reset and rate action. An application of instrumentation for continuous process control is explained.
description: Illustrates the advantages to be derived from applying automatic control to a process in a small chemical plant. The four modes of control are discussed: on/off; proportional; proportional with reset; proportional with reset and rate action. An application of instrumentation for continuous process control is explained.

The four modes of control are discussed: on/off; proportional; proportional with reset; proportional with reset and rate action. An application of instrumentation for continuous process control is explained.
